      • processSourceDirectoryRequest

        public static int processSourceDirectoryRequest(com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.Channel chnl,
                                                com.thomsonreuters.upa.codec.DecodeIterator dIter,
                                                com.thomsonreuters.upa.codec.Msg msg,
                                                int maxMsgSize)
        Processes a source directory request. This consists of decoding the source directory request and calling * sendSourceDirectoryResponse() to send the source directory response. *
        Parameters:
        chnl - - the Channel of connection *
        dIter - - The decode iterator *
        msg - - The partially decoded message *
        maxMsgSize - - The channel max message size *

      • sendSourceDirectoryResponse

        public static int sendSourceDirectoryResponse(com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.Channel channel,
                                              int maxMsgSize,
                                              java.lang.String serviceName,
                                              int serviceId)
        Send Source Directory response to a channel. This consists of getting a message buffer, setting the source directory * response information, encoding the source directory response, and sending the source directory response to * the consumer. The Source Directory domain model conveys information about all available services in the system. * An OMM consumer typically requests a Source Directory to retrieve information about available services and their capabilities. *
        Parameters:
        channel - - the Channel of connection *
        maxMsgSize - - The channel max message size *
        serviceName - - The service name specified by the OMM interactive provider application (Optional to set) *
        serviceId - - the serviceId specified by the OMM interactive provider application (Optional to set) *

      • sendSrcDirectoryRequestRejectStatusMsg

        public static int sendSrcDirectoryRequestRejectStatusMsg(com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.Channel channel,
                                                         int streamId,
                                                         DirectoryRejectReason reason,
                                                         int maxFragmentSize)
        Sends the source directory request reject status message for a channel.
        Parameters:
        channel - - the Channel of connection
        streamId - - The stream id of the source directory request reject status
        reason - - The reason for the reject
        maxFragmentSize - - max fragment size before fragmentation
